name: RedEcho
descr: [RedEcho](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1042) is a Peopleâ€™s Republic of China-related threat actor associated with long-running intrusions in Indian critical infrastructure entities. [RedEcho](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1042) overlaps with various other PRC-linked threat groups, such as [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096), and is linked to [ShadowPad](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0596) malware use through shared infrastructure.(Citation: RecordedFuture RedEcho 2021)(Citation: RecordedFuture RedEcho 2022)

subtechniques.name: Domains
subtechniques.descr: [RedEcho](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1042) has registered domains spoofing Indian critical infrastructure entities.(Citation: RecordedFuture RedEcho 2021)

subtechniques.name: Web Protocols
subtechniques.descr: [RedEcho](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1042) network activity is associated with SSL traffic via TCP 443 and proxied HTTP traffic over non-standard ports.(Citation: RecordedFuture RedEcho 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Dynamic Resolution
technique_table_data.descr: [RedEcho](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1042) used dynamic DNS domains associated with malicious infrastructure.(Citation: RecordedFuture RedEcho 2021)

subtechniques.name: Asymmetric Cryptography
subtechniques.descr: [RedEcho](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1042) uses SSL for network communication.(Citation: RecordedFuture RedEcho 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Non-Standard Port
technique_table_data.descr: [RedEcho](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1042) has used non-standard ports such as TCP 8080 for HTTP communication.(Citation: RecordedFuture RedEcho 2021)

software_data.name: ShadowPad
software_data.descr: [RedEcho](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1042) has used [ShadowPad](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0596) during intrusions.(Citation: RecordedFuture RedEcho 2021)(Citation: RecordedFuture RedEcho 2022)
